articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper says he can still get better during his run at the US Open after he beat Alex de Minaur to reach his first Grand Slam semi-final.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jack Draper says he has another 'level' for first major semi-final

articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction to Ballon D'Or nominees as Bellingham, Foden & Haaland are all listed, plus reaction to Arsenal v Rangers.
articles.title: Football LIVE: Bellingham, Foden & Haaland named as Ballon d'Or nominees

articles.description: Olympic athlete Rebecca Cheptegei dies after petrol attack
articles.title: Olympic athlete Rebecca Cheptegei dies after petrol attack

articles.description: Jos Buttler is ruled out of the T20 series starting next week and is a doubt for the five one-day internationals that follow.
articles.title: England v Australia T20s: Jos Buttler out of series with calf injury

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at those aiming to impress when England return to action for the first time since Gareth Southgate resigned as manager.
articles.title: England v Republic of Ireland: New era - who has a point to prove as Lee Carsley takes charge?

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Great Britain's Jack Draper and his journey to become a US Open semi-finalist.
articles.title: Jack Draper: How British player became US Open semi-finalist

articles.description: The New York Jets and fit-again Aaron Rodgers aim to stop the Kansas City Chiefs becoming the first NFL team to win three straight Super Bowls this season.
articles.title: NFL 2024 season preview: Kansas City Chiefs v Baltimore Ravens kicks off action - all you need to know

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka is the only Grand Slam winner to feature in the US Open semi-finals - BBC Sport takes a look at the four contenders.
articles.title: US Open women's semi-finals: Aryna Sabalenka faces Emma Navarro and Jessica Pegula plays Karolina Muchova in last four

articles.description: Czech Karolina Muchova overcomes illness to reach her second consecutive US Open semi-final with a 6-1 6-4 win over Beatriz Haddad Maia.
articles.title: US Open: Karolina Muchova beats Beatriz Haddad Maia to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Olympic pole vault champion Armand Duplantis clocks 10.37 seconds to beat 400m hurdler Karsten Warholm in a 100m exhibition race.
articles.title: Armand Duplantis beats Karsten Warholm in 100m exhibition race in Zurich
